object.name: blackberry
object.comment: The blackberry object is the root of all BlackBerry specific JavaScript functionality. blackberry.network is available by default in the regular browser.
object.example:
<script type="text/javascript">
  alert("You are on the " + blackberry.network + " Network");
</script>

property.name: network
property.comment: Returns the wireless network on which the BlackBerry device is communicating.
property.details: The value may be one of: 3GPP, CDMA,iDEN, or Wi-Fi. Multiple networks may be supported on a single BlackBerry device. If multiple networks are supported, they are returned as a commaseparated list. For example: 3GPP,Wi-Fi.
